transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, Ilma? Hello.
Customer: Ji sir. Aap kaun bol rahe ho? Ilma baat kare? Baat kar rahi hu sir. Ji sir.
Customer: Achcha, mere ko ek kaam kijiye aap ki jaise TrustSeal ek saal ka jo hai na, mere ko ek aap offer bhej dijiye aapki taraf se renew ka par mere ko one year ka chahiye. Ek saal ka chahiye.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai aapke hisab se jo best jo hai wo mere ko bhejiye. Ek cheez ye hai, thik hai. Uske andar kya kya service milegi wo bhi bhej dena.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Ek saal ke andar jitna amount mere ko bharna hai aur iska kitna wo kya kya service aapko mil rahi hai jo aap service de rahe ho wo bhi bhejna hai. Ek cheez ye hai, thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Thik hai sir. One year ka bheju na offer ka.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Aapke is month ke offer ka hi bhejo na sir.
Customer: Aapki aawaz kat gayi kya bolna chah rahe ho aap?
Executive: Sir, main keh rahi hu ki ye November month ka hi bhejo na offer ka.
Customer: Haan, thik hai November month ka bhej do aap.
Executive: Thik hai. Haan, aur kya keh rahe the sir?
Customer: Aur dusra mere ko ek cheez mere ko puchni hai ki jaise export lead aapki aati hai.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: To usme daily base mein export lead kitni generate hoti hai?
Executive: Sir, dekhiye wo to depend karta hai product dekhna padega aapko ki kitne aapka kaun se product mein kitni hai. Ek second rukiyega sir, let me check once.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir, daily basis pe hamara dekhiye main aapko quantify karke nahi bata paungi but aapke product mein lead daily basis pe aati hai IndiaMART pe. Aapke to kaise pata chalega dekho madam ek cheez main batata hu Ilma ji.
Customer: Mera investment aur mera kaam jo hai wo usme aisa rahega ki lead ke upar mera business chalta hai. Jab tak aap mere ko lead nahi denge kitni generate hoti hai jaise aapne bola ki bhi apne pan India mein do lead daily aapka free lead aapka aati hai aur weekly aapki itni aati hai thik hai jaise TrustSeal ke andar aati hai to aap kehna se bata dete ho ki sir itni lead milegi aapko.
Executive: Sir, isme mere ko.
Customer: Mere ko aur dijiye dusri ek cheez hai ki aapki lead ke andar maine last abhi abhi main aap dekh sakte ho maine abhi ek week mein abhi do teen din se main workout kar raha hu uske andar sample lead jyada aati hai wo mere ko nahi chahiye sample ki.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: 10 kilo, 5 kilo, 1 kilo waisi lead aati hai wo kyun generate hoti hai uska to koi mera koi fayda hi nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Ye sample lead hai ye sample lead leke main kya karunga?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To main thodi company export pe baitha hu ki 10 kilo, 5 kilo, 1 kilo sample lead mere ko chahiye. Wo aise pehle jo lead aati thi waisi lead nahi aati hai aapki shuru mein.
Executive: Abhi jo mere paas abhi jo main dekh rahi hu wo aapko jo leads aayi hai wo waise to retail ki dikh rahi hai but kuch hai jo bulk orders ki bhi hai abhi instant matlab currently 50 ki abhi ho sakta hai ki sir dekhiye ye foreign ke customers hai to ho sakta hai ye pehle aap se connect karna chahe samples ke liye aur phir aapko phir bada order de aisa bhi ho sakta hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi ye sample dekho main pan India ki bhi baat kar raha hu usme bhi aisa hai. Sample sample order ka lead hoti hai koi matlab hi nahi hoti hai 10 kilo 20 kilo bhejo sample order kya karne ka. Aap bulk mein order deke wo bolte hai ki mera pehle sample test karunga uske baad aapka ye bulk order lunga to main samajh sakta hu.
Executive: Aap samajh rahe ho.
Customer: Thik hai aur wo requirement hi uski 20 kilo hai to 20 kilo se uske baad kya karunga aage.
Executive: Hmm. Hmm.
Customer: To sample lead to mera koi kaam ki hi nahi hai madam wo aap dekh lo aap wo to domestic koi matlab hi nahi hai ye aap domestic jaise abhi abhi dekho teen char din se main daily main lead consume kar raha hu daily main dekh raha hu thik hai iske andar iske andar sample lead hi aati hai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: To bulk lead hai hi nahi.
Executive: Ha. Sir, wo mere ko mera aur dusri dusri dusri ha dusri cheez main aapko batau jaise koi bhi lead main kholta hu abhi to chalo jaise two in one hai three in one wo main samajh sakta hu wo bhi samajh sakta hu kuch lead aisi aati hai to koi kaam ki hi nahi aati hai.
Customer: To mere kaam ki hi nahi hai heavy duty consumer adhesive ke HD barrel mein wo wala bond business bench adhesive wo koi kuch kaam ki hoti hi nahi hai kuch aisi hai to construction adhesive aati hai to main banata nahi hu jyadatar maximum wo milti hai brush ke sath free matlab 5 kilo wala ha but sir main aapki lead check aapki lead check kar rahi thi sir to abhi jo recent mein aapne aaj uthai hai wo ek 500 quantity ki uthai hai monthly ke liye customer ne bola hai fabric.
Customer: Ye 500 piece hai 500 piece hai fabric ki main subah teen uthai main. Ha.
Customer: Abhi jaise ye dekho aap Ahmedabad ki 10 kilo bhi order diya hai wo kya karu 10 kilo Ahmedabad mein bech ke mera carton 60 20 kilo ka hai 10 10 kilo bhi do. Abhi 10 kilo ka main karu kya? Ha business to pan India basis pe karte hai na service mein. Ha? Business to pan India basis pe karte hai na. Pan India basis pe karta hu Ahmedabad ho to Delhi ho to abhi dekho Delhi ki dekho aap chalo main jeevan jo supremo ko main convert karu par 20 kilo leke kya karunga. Aur 20 kilo leke aaya main samajh sakta hu sir usko main convert kiya usko aur uska quantity 20 kilo hai to 20 kilo ko leke kya karunga aap samjho. Abhi iske niche dekh lo aap usko food tech wala wo 10 kilo. reason ke liye aayi thi sir 125 kilo ke liye. Mera to 500 kilo ek ton ka jo hota hai na 125 se 250 kilo tak hota hai to main chalaunga par 10 10 kilo 5 kilo packing side dega 5 kilo aur uski quantity 10 kilo Chennai ki dekh lo aap. Ek aayi hui thi buylead Ghaziabad ki usme wo 125 kilo mang raha tha. ji Ilma ji Ilma ji ek baat samjho 10 lead aisi 10 kilo aati hai aur ek lead 500 ki aayegi to koi matlab hai? Thik hai sir. Main ye business mera business mera isse generate hota hai. Ji. Ye lead se generate hota hai business baki mera business kaise hoga mere ko aap bataye chalo koi Pidilite company ka use karte hai to meri jimmedari hai Pidilite company se meri company mein exchange nahi ki main aise thodi bolta hu ki aap uska wo lao nahi never par mere ko lead sahi dhang se to mile. Hmm. Aap hi dekh lo aapke samne. Hain? Inquiry jo aapko aati hai. Inquiry kaun si wali? Direct. Sir jo ha direct inquiry jo customer kar raha hai. To uske andar aati hai to uske andar main baat karta hu wo to kya usme aapke yaha pe aisa hai jo continue kaam karega na usko direct inquiry aati hai jo beech mein kaam band kar dega na koi lead nahi lega na to direct call bhi aana band ho jayega ye aapka waha pe waisa. Sir actually wo artificial intelligence ke basis pe hota hai na to phir usse apne aap listing drop hoti hai is wajah se wo aana shuru ho jati hai aapko thoda sa kam aati hai. Main dekho main usme main maine maine direct inquiry ki baat hi nahi ki aap bol rahe ho thik hai mere ko lead ki baat nahi hai. Main nahi dekho mere ko main dekho jo aata hai main usko main nahi bol raha hu main abhi yaha se lead generate karunga to main kya lead generate karu mere ko aap batao aap mere ko do free dete ho wo dete ho are 100 doge to bhi mere liye kaam ki nahi hai aap samjho. Ji. Ji. Transfer water. Ye ye aap samajh rahe ho na abhi to aapne baat nikal ha wo wo aap dekho ki ki dekho madam direct lead wo party dekh ke mere ko karti hai thik hai aur ye jo hoti hai na to usko mere samne hoti hai ki do free daily hoti hai wo chali jati hai to saat din ke andar mere ko wo aapki do do lead jo aati hai 14 lead jo bhi hoti hai wo mere ko saat din ke andar khatam karni padti hai to bhi uske baad saat din ke baad wo chali jati hai wo phir return nahi aayegi thik hai to mere ko wo cheez chahiye ki agar main kuch din me baitha hu to 5 5 10 10 kilo to main Delhi nahi bhejunga na. Hmm. Ye dekho Bangalore se aap dekho. Ji. Aap dekh rahe ho na lead dekh rahe ho na. karwati hu main dekh sakti hu sir ek baar main check karwati hu aur aapka thoda sa catalog mein aur thoda buyleads mein bhi main ek baar check karwati hu aur aapke colleague se bolti hu aap se ek baar connect kare video meeting pe. Achcha dusri cheez dusri cheez dekho jo main mudde se hat gaye to aapne bataya isliye maine aapko bata diya abhi main online baitha hu abhi main baat hi kar raha hu party se sab thik hai abhi main aapko ye dikhata hu aapne jo mere ko ek to aap wo bhej dijiye aapka quotation thik hai TrustSeal ek saal ka aur jo mere ko ek cheez hai jo daily basis pe export ki jo lead hai wo generate kitni hoti hai mere ko wo chahiye tab pata chalega na main uska quotation mein aapke generate kaise karoge agar mere ko export export ki lead thi special export aapka kya division pehle mix tha pan India aur export ka kuch nahi aisa tha abhi export ka alag kar diya to export ki lead kya generate jo hoti hai to kitni dete ho aap wo to mere ko chahiye na aap wo isliye to main aapko puch raha hu. Ek baar main check karwa leti hu iska thoda sa mujhe knowledge. Achcha ek baar aap check karwa lo mere ko call back karo mere ko suno mere ko call back karo iska bhi mere ko quotation chahiye ki aap kya kya service dete ho export lead mein thik hai par quotation banane se pehle mere se ek baar call karna ke mere ko daily itni free hoti hai ke weekly itni dete ho aur wo mere ko batana aap jo bhi ho mujhe malum nahi hai main isliye puch raha hu aap se. Okay sir ek baar na mujhe thoda sa time dijiyega main ek baar check karke team se baat karke aapko phir call karti hu aur phir proper abhi kal abhi TrustSeal ka bhej de rahi hu aur jo export ka hai wo thodi der baad bhejti hu main aapko. Nahi koi koi koi baat nahi hai. Thik hai aur dusra kya tha main aapko batau madam achcha wo aapne ticket kaun si wali abhi aap bol rahe the wo kaun si complaint wali thi? Incoming sir incoming call ki aayi hogi ki aapne are you satisfied with us aise karke aaya hoga to aap us pe yes kar dijiyega. Matlab main samjha nahi kya bolna chah rahe ho aap? Aapne aapne incoming call kiya tha na to moon ne aapka phone nahi uthaya tha to hamare paas wo complaint ke form mein open ho jata hai sir. Koi problem nahi hai sir agar aapke paas mail hoga to aap reply back kar dijiyega nahi aayega to koi issue nahi hai thik hai. Koi koi baat nahi thik hai sir main ek baar share karti hu aapko thik hai. All right. Thik thik hai okay Ilma ji. Okay. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants TrustSeal renewal offer for one year.

- Wants to know the amount to be paid.

- Enquires about daily export lead generation.

- Sample leads are of no use.

- Leads are not relevant to his business.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to send TrustSeal offer.

- Executive will check on export lead generation.

- Executive will check catalog and buyleads.

- Executive will connect with colleague for video meeting.

- Executive will send TrustSeal offer and export details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back with details.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, export leads, sample leads, quotation
